julia> w = workers()
4-element Array{Int64,1}:
 2
 3
 4
 5

julia> n = 1
1

julia> for i=1:10, j=1:10
       n = (n < 4) ? n+1 : 1;
       a[i,j] = remotecall_fetch(w[n], (a,i,j) -> a+i+j, a[i,j], i, j)
       end

julia> a
